title: Convenient Single family home near Santa Clara Square
posting_body: Two storey 1600 sq ft single family home in a convenient location near hi-tech companies (Santa Clara Square).
- New Agnew School District schools (Middle: Dolores Huerta; High: Kathleen MacDonald)
- Easy access to Santa Clara Square, 49er Levi stadium, Great America, Rivermark plaza, light rail, ACE train station
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet with spacious built in shelves
- Easy to maintain backyard with beautiful rose bushes
- Good credit and proof of income required
- Contact via email for appointments to view
- Terms negotiable; longer lease is also possible
